message: Let's start with a fair split. Accept and we can move on to the next round.
I'll give you a small share, but I think I deserve more
You're being greedy, Bob. I'm willing to give you a decent share, but don't expect me to be generous.
I'll give you a slightly better offer, but don't think I'll go any higher
You're not budging, Bob? Fine, I'll take 60% and leave you with 40%. Don't expect any more concessions from me.
I'll meet you halfway, but I think I deserve a slightly better deal
